name: 吳漢雄
objective:
本課程旨於深入探討如何利用數學方法來分析並了解工程上之問題之數學模式，藉以「線性轉換」、「向量分析」、「微分算子」與「複變分析」等四大內容，以及其應用方法。
Course Outline
The Laplace Transformation
1. Introduction
2. Definition of Laplace Transformation
3. Sectionally Contionuous Function,Exponential Order
4. Transforms of Derivative
5. The Gamma Function
6. The Inverse Transform
7. A Theorem on Substitution
8. The Use of Partical Fractions
9. The solution of Simple Differential Equation
10. Generation of the Transformation
11. Translation of F(t)
12. Step Function
13. Convolution,Properties of Convolution
14. Derivatives of Transforms
15. Series of Transforms
16. Periodic Function
17. Partical Function
Linear Algebra
1. Linear Equations
2. Matrices
3. Determinants
4. System of Linear Algebraic Equation.Rank of a Matrix
5. Vector Space
6. Scalar Product
7. Orthonormal Basis
8. Quadratic Forms.Hermitian Forms
9. Systems of Odinary Differential Equations.Vibration Problem
10. Linear Programming
Differential Equation
1. Introdution to Differential Equations
2. First-order Differential Equations
2.1 Separable Variables
2.2 Linear Equations
2.3 Exact Equation
2.4 Bernoulli Equation
2.5 Riccati equation
3. High-Order Differential Equations
3.1 Preliminary Theory：Linear Equations
3.2 Reduction of Order
3.3 Homugeneous Linear Equations with Constant Coeffcients
3.4 Undetermined Coeffcients
3.5 Variation of Parameters
3.6 Inverse Operator
Fourier Series
1. Self-adjoint Differential Equations
2. Green’s Function
3. Construction of Green’s Function
4. Orthogonal Sets of Functions
5. Eigenvalued Problem
6. A Representation Theorem
7. The Generalized Fourier Series
8. Fourier Cosine and Sine Series
9. Complex Fourier Series and Frequency Specturm
10. The Reduced Sturm-Liouville System
11. Bessel and Legendre Series
schedule:
第一~七週 線性轉換
i. 矩陣與聯立方程組之關係
ii. 線性向量空間與內積
iii. 線性轉換
iv. 特徵值及特徵向量
第八到十週 拉普拉斯變換
i. 拉普拉斯概念
ii. 拉氏變換存在條件
iii. 拉氏變換的性質
iv. 卷積定理、初值與終值定理
第九到十三週 常微分方程式
i. 拉氏解常微分方程
ii. 分離變數法
iii. 齊次方程式
iv. 正合方程式
v. 合併積分法
第十四到十八週 傅立葉分析與特徵值問題
i. 傅立葉級數
ii. 特徵函數及斯圖姆-劉維爾問題
